mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, James Hollingsworth to Lily Laughton, 19 October 1881
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hollingsworth, John McHenry, 1823-1889
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from James Hollingsworth, Superintendent, to Lily Macalester Laughton, Regent, October 19, 1881. He has finished painting the barn and other things he considered necessary. Asks that she send his money appropriated for the purpose by the last Council as they have not had enough visitors recently to make up the money spent on painting efforts.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Papers of Lily Macalester Berghmans Laughton
